product_name: Roxy Rio Halter Bikini Set - Girls'
long_description: The girls' Roxy Rio Halter Bikini Set sports a vibrant jungle print that matches your surf diva's love of adventure. Halter top can be adjusted for the perfect amount of coverage; matching bottoms offer a higher rise with full coverage; polyester lining. Strong and resilient nylon/spandex blend is smooth to the touch and helps protect skin from rashes. Colors on the Roxy Rio Halter Bikini Set stay nice and bright even after several seasons in the surf and sun. Hand wash cold.
short_description: The girls' Roxy Rio Halter Bikini Set sports a vibrant jungle print that matches your surf diva's love of adventure.
